reviews.review: I do not recommend newbies to play this game now. The game's atmosphere is created well, the character design is also very creative. However, the game's matchmaking mechanism simply sucks. The matchmaking mechanism is unreasonable and will lead to no game experience for newbies in the early stages. I've been playing the game for 188 hours and when I became a killer, I was matched with 4 bands of players and I could only watch them show their skills. Only when I team up with my friends can I have a game experience. Above.

I'm a huge fan of this game and all, but i wouldn't recommend this game because it has so many bugs and the dev's are careless to fix it. New things get brought to the game which means new bugs are introduced or current bugs just worsen and it just makes the game not enjoyable or even playable.
This game gives me the chills. Perfect game for those horror show lovers out there. Also don't mess up the skill check

This is pretty epic chungus if ur lickin up what im putting down. If there was voice chat for the surviors it would be EVEN more epic chungus!! Love the game, gets annoying, kinda annoying sometimes and only fun with friends. but the voice chat would be really flippin cool dawgs
una mierda no viene con el atuendo de claire

It's a fun game as long as you know people are playing to win, and to not give a shit if people think your build is toxic. I like the different playstyles each killer offers plus being able to teach perks from one killer to another. Same with survivors. Although playing solo-queue as a survivor can be hit or miss, so it's a much better experience if you have buddies to play with. Also they have licensed killers and survivors such as Michael Myers, Pyramid Head, Nemesis, some Resident Evil characters like Leon and Jill. They also have the Demogorgon, Nancy, and Steve but their license is ending on the 17th of November so if you want to buy them, get it before that date.

Yeah, I like this game

Its gonna be one of those games you really really love.....but hate with every fibre of your being.
Your gonna keep playing though lol
A fun game to relax to before going to sleep, haven't played much tho!

this games anti-cheat software is dumb and unreliable, somehow actual hackers/cheaters don't get banned/kicked but me who is just playing the game well as well as my friends have been kicked during games for doing nothing wrong. fix your anti-cheat software!
i put my balls in his (danny) jaw
Be ready to get sucked in big time.

Dead By Daylight is an interesting dynamic of survivors and killers, each with some pretty amazing perks. its fun to play normal games with friends and people you meet in random lobbies. The game does have its moments of some glitches but they are usually spotted quickly, as far as customization goes its got a number of skins to choose from and the skins aren't low quality either. the game has updates still to this day and I look forward to seeing what the developers have in store for us!
Favorite horror game. So much fun, great team playing game. So much fun to play with friends.
Quite a fun multiplayer experience. Even better with friends!
Great horror, jump scare game....highly recommend if you are into friendly scares and have a liking for 80's horror movies :-)
